metadata.title: SoloBoard - Monitor All Your Sites in One Dashboard
metadata.description: Track GA4 analytics, Stripe revenue, and uptime status for up to 10 websites in a single dashboard. Built for solo entrepreneurs. Save 2 hours daily.
metadata.keywords: website monitoring, ga4 dashboard, stripe analytics, uptime monitoring, multi-site dashboard, solo entrepreneur tools, website analytics, revenue tracking, site monitoring
